description: Retrieves a list of code generation jobs for a specified Amplify app and backend environment.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for the Amplify app.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is a part of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: entities
nested_items.description: The list of code generation jobs for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app associated with the code generation job.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment associated with the code generation job.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the code generation job summary.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time that the code generation job summary was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time that the code generation job summary was modified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's included if more results are available.
